articles.author: Cleve R. Wootson Jr., Yasmeen Abutaleb
articles.title: Harris meets with Arab American and Muslim leaders in Michigan - The Washington Post
articles.description: Meeting comes as VP holds a rally in Flint, site of a 2014 water crisis that became a symbol of government neglect
articles.content: FLINT, Mich. Vice President Kamala Harris met with Arab American and Muslim leaders in Michigan on Friday, part of an ongoing effort to stem defections from a pivotal group of voters who have fiercel… [+8053 chars]
